name: postera-circuits
description: Circom circuits for Postera shielded transactions

scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:spend && npm run compile:output
scripts.setup:spend: snarkjs groth16 setup build/spend.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_20.ptau build/spend_0000.zkey
scripts.setup:output: snarkjs groth16 setup build/output.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_20.ptau build/output_0000.zkey
scripts.export:spend-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/spend_final.zkey build/spend_vkey.json
scripts.export:output-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/output_final.zkey build/output_vkey.json
